name: Candy Pop War
description:
Welcome to a sensational jewel adventure full of challenging obstacles and ultra exciting missions in the most wonderful setting ever! Join the golden-haired peasant boy Kenny in his super exciting journey through the fantasy kingdom, help him fight evil minions who have taken away his puppy and make sure he saves the entire kingdom from a tyrannical rule! Match jewels of the same shape and color, activate stunning blast effects, clear all obstacles in front of you,

Features:
- More than 100 adventurous levels to complete!
- Easy and fun to play, challenging to master, definitely one of the most exciting “jewel games” free with levels!
- Colorful and vivid graphics, top-notch performance and fantastic music effects!
- More levels coming soon!
